column4: National Renewable Energy Laboratory (NREL). Data derived from IHS Markit light-duty vehicle registrations in 2018
Only all-electric vehicles (EVs)  are included in this chart; plug-in hybrid electric vehicles (PHEVs) are not included.
California had approximately 256,800 light-duty electric vehicle registrations in 2018, but the chart is cut off at 30,000 to make it easier to see the other states.
